item.title: Adding Login Box and Changing Mod/Admin Crowns?
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

My Login Box is the original Runescape Login Box. In the Sprites folder there isn’t one, I’ve tried to add but failed. Any more suggestions?

  • Also, changing the Administrator/Moderator Crown? I’ve done this

Added the Icons to my sprites folder.
Mod -
Admin -

And edited Class 30 Sub2 Sub1 Sub1.java using these codes.

else if (s.equalsIgnoreCase("mod_icon")) { try { Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./sprites/"+s+" "+i+".png"); //System.getProperty("user.dir") + "\\"+i+".png"); anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440); pixelgrabber.grabPixels(); //System.out.println(s+" "+i+".png"+ " hopefully loaded"); } catch (Exception exception) { System.out.println(((Object) (exception))); } }
^ Thats for the Admin Icon ^

else if (s.equalsIgnoreCase("mod_icons")) { try { Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./sprites/"+s+" "+i+".png"); //System.getProperty("user.dir") + "\\"+i+".png"); anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440); pixelgrabber.grabPixels(); //System.out.println(s+" "+i+".png"+ " hopefully loaded"); } catch (Exception exception) { System.out.println(((Object) (exception))); } }

^ That’s for the Mod Icon ^

But when I log in on my Client, the Admin Icon is the old yellow one, and the Mod one is the old grey one.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Login Box and Changing Mod/Admin Crowns?
